title: Colorimetric sensing for translational applications: from colorants to mechanisms
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4CS00328D, Review Article
Zhicheng Jin, Wonjun Yim, Maurice Retout, Emily Housel, Wenbin Zhong, Jiajing Zhou, Michael S. Strano, Jesse V. Jokerst
This review summarizes insights into colorant selection and signal mechanisms for the development of colorimetric sensing and POC sensors.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
